== Main inclusion report for libxt-java ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' `http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libxt-java`, arch: all

2. ''Rationale:'' Build dependency of `openoffice.org2`.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No executables.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: no Debian bugs
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian library and package policy met.
* <rant>calling the package libxslt-java would not have been too verbose...</rant>
